nodes.text: "Mother Calrissian" was one of the parents of Lando Calrissian. In his adulthood, Calrissian recalled that she had the ability to remember hundreds of songs and poems. He also recalled her advice: "Never stand when you can sit down, and never sit when you can lie down", when Admiral Hiram Drayson found Calrissian in his office, sitting in his own chair. She also told her son that gambling would be the end of him.
